attributes.action: raise the national speed limit for motorcycles on motorways by 10mph.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like to see the speed limit on motorways increased by 10mph for motorcycles with no change on main roads.
Only full licence holders are allowed on the motorway network, Therefore they already have a skills base in place.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
